copy:
I look forward to connecting with you. We can talk about anything - the weather, cats, travel, food, or the next greatest project idea. We can also sit in absolute silence and delight in the awkwardness. Either way, I'd love to meet you!

Feel free to email me and I will get back to you within 1-2 business days. If you would like to meet virtually, take a look at my availability in the link above.

I look forward to hearing from you!

Lilian
